professional_summary: Experienced Technical Representative with expertise in technical consulting, product applications, and client training. Proven track record in market research, strategy development, and collaboration with R&D teams.

key_responsibilities: Manage 110 accounts across 14 western states to provide technical consulting
and devise plans for increased profitability.
Create demand via product marketing & positioning

key_responsibilities: Perpetuate new cultivar ideas & development to final patented products.

Propagate plants via cuttings and pollination.

key_responsibilities: Created and managed online horticulture workshops and courses.
Conducted meta-analyses for preliminary environmental reports.
Devised follow-up research to measure program's impact.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Marie Biology
